SELECT DISTINCT SDSCL.catalog_code , SDSC.catalog_desc , stx_dis_sd_catalog_length_f(SDSCL.catalog_code) catalog_length FROM stx_dis_sd_catalog_length SDSCL, stx_dis_sd_catalog SDSC WHERE 1=1 AND SDSCL.CATALOG_CODE = SDSC.CATALOG_CODE
AND SDSCL.catalog_code LIKE #{p_catalog_code} || '%'
AND SDSC.catalog_desc LIKE #{p_catalog_desc} || '%'
AND stx_dis_sd_catalog_length_f(SDSCL.catalog_code) LIKE '%' || #{p_catalog_length} || '%'
ORDER BY SDSCL.catalog_code
